overview:
We are FFshop24, a professional retail/wholesale online shopping mall and more. Our goal is to provide our best selling Korean fashion products to your company. We assure you that FFshop24 is dedicated to providing only high quality products for our customers. We sell not only products that are on our list, but also fashion items that our client is wishing to purchase in best price for wholesale by request. We are looking for:

  • Wholesalers/Retailers who are interested in our listed products.
  • Wholesalers/Retailers who are interested in our unlisted products. (If you want us to produce the item of a certain design or a sample, for wholesale) To know us better, check out our website : www.ffshop24.com For more information and questions, please contact us at : INFO@ffshop24.com Hope you enjoy them

We hope you have a lovely day. Sincerely, FFshop24

www.ffshop24.com http://www.facebook.com/ffshop24 https://twitter.com/ffshop_24 For more information and questions, please contact us at : INFO@ffshop24.com
